mapper.insert: insert into p_member values(#{p_id}, #{password}, #{p_name}, #{gender}, #{phone}, null, #{final_edu}, #{school}, #{major}, default, default)
mapper.select: select * from p_member where phone=#{phone} and p_name=#{p_name}
mapper.update: update p_member set p_name=#{p_name}, phone=#{phone}, final_edu=#{final_edu}, school=#{school}, major=#{major} where p_id=#{p_id}
update p_member set password=#{password} where p_id=#{p_id}
